methods.name: eth_call
methods.summary: Executes a new message call immediately without submitting a transaction to the network

params.name: to
params.summary: transaction recipient or null if deploying a contract

params.name: gasPrice
params.summary: price in wei of each gas used

params.name: value
params.summary: value in wei sent with this transaction

params.name: data
params.summary: contract code or a hashed method call with encoded args
